main.name: Burak Karaoglan
main.description: Experienced Java developer & clean coder in various fields like transportation, aviation, finance industries. Always keen to learn new technologies, and looking to take more leadership over project delivery. Keeping up new technologies. Following SOLID principles not just in theory.

education.school: VWU - German Preparation Programme of Technical University of Vienna
education.description: The VWU is an institution providing university preparation courses for international students. Its role is to prepare students for supplementary examinations. The VWU offers intensive courses for foreign applicants for a place at university to prepare them for supplementary examinations prescribed by the universities.

testimonials.text: Burak Karaoğlan is not only a responsible and ambitious programmer but also an inspiring person. Very good and broad-minded developer - that's him! Dedicated, insightful and precise. Strongly I recommend him.
